title: Cold King, the Doctor Fei Is Running Away - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Xuanhuan
tags: Alchemy   Artifact Crafting   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Cultivation   Doctors   Female Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: 寞然回首
description:
[Strong man and a strong woman, clear words, sweet love]

Once she crossed over, she became a bullied trash. Watch her now as she concoct pills, refine artifacts, govern treasures, crush white lotuses, and tame beasts.

She points her sword to the heavens with pride.

Yet unexpectedly she falls into the hands of a certain two-faced cold prince.

When she was eaten again and again, Feng Xing Ying bellows “GET LOST!”

He hooks his finger: “Darling, I’m ready to get lost in these sheets whenever you want.”>
